shared.models

Class ModelFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.models.ModelFacade

  • public class ModelFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class sits between the Game Model, the Controllers and Server Facade. Its purpose is to simplify the interactions between all three.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelFacade()
      Instrcutor with no params
      ModelFacade(Inspector inspector)
      Instrcutor

    • Method Detail

      • getInspector

        public Inspector getInspector()
        Returns:
        the inspector

      • setInspector

        public void setInspector(Inspector inspector)
        Parameters:
        inspector - the inspector to set

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
                 throws MessageException
        Initially it sends the message to the game model. If there were no errors it then proceeds to send the message to the server facade to update the server. If that was successful, it will then check the new received model to see if the message indeed was added and will make any additional changes that might have come with the model.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be sent
        Throws:
        MessageException - User is not a member of a game

      • buyDevCard

        public boolean buyDevCard()
                   throws DevCardException
        Checks with the model to see if user can buy a dev card. If so, it assigns him one. These changes are then made on the server and the result is compared with the current model.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the user received a card
        Throws:
        DevCardException

      • playMonopolyCard

        public void playMonopolyCard(ResourceType resource)
                      throws DevCardException
        Checks the model for pre conditions. Makes the changes in the model. Makes the changes in the server. Verifies result.
        Throws:
        DevCardException

      • playMonumentCard

        public void playMonumentCard()
                      throws DevCardException
        Tells the model to increment the level of victory of points. Updates the model on the server. Verifies returned model.
        Throws:
        DevCardException

      • playRoadBuildCard

        public void playRoadBuildCard(EdgeLocation spot1,
                              EdgeLocation spot2)
                       throws DevCardException
        Checks model for validity. Performs operation. Sends update to server. Compares the received model to its current model.
        Parameters:
        spot1 - first place to put a road
        spot2 - second place to put a road
        Throws:
        DevCardException - Pre conditions not met

      • playSoldierCard

        public void playSoldierCard(HexLocation location,
                            int victimIndex)
                     throws DevCardException
        Checks model for validity, performs the operation, updates the server, compares the result.
        Parameters:
        location - new location of the robber
        victimIndex - player you robbing (-1 for no one)
        Throws:
        DevCardException - pre condition violation

      • yearOfPlentyCard

        public void yearOfPlentyCard(ResourceType resource1,
                             ResourceType resource2)
                      throws DevCardException
        Parameters:
        resource1 - first desired resource
        resource2 - second desired resource
        Throws:
        DevCardException - Violation of preconditions

      • discard

        public void discard(ResourceType[] discardedCards)
             throws DiscardException
        Takes away the listed cards from the user
        Parameters:
        discardedCards -
        Throws:
        DiscardException - Pre-conditions not met

      • increaseAmount

        public boolean increaseAmount(ResourceType resource,
                              int amount)
                       throws DiscardException,
                              TradeException
        Checks the model to see if a user can increase a given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - User's resource to increase
        amount - Amount to increase it by
        Returns:
        Whether or not the amount of a user's resource can decrease
        Throws:
        DiscardException - Pre-conditions not met
        TradeException

      • acceptTrade

        public void acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
                 throws TradeException
        Changes the model depending on what was chosen then it tells the server. It then compares the model returned by the server to its own.
        Parameters:
        willAccept - Whether or not the user accepts the trade
        Throws:
        TradeException - Pre condition not met

      • sendTradeOffer

        public void sendTradeOffer(java.util.Map<ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> offer,
                           int receiver)
                    throws TradeException
        Sends a trade offer to the server to be processed
        Parameters:
        offer - Resources and their amounts to be given (-numbers mean the user gets those cards)
        receiver - ID of the recipient of the cards
        Throws:
        TradeException - Pre Condition failure

      • createNewGame

        public void createNewGame(java.lang.String name,
                          boolean randomTiles,
                          boolean randomNumbers,
                          boolean randomPorts)
                   throws NonMoveException
        Sends a user's input to the server to create a new game
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the game
        randomTiles - Set the tiles randomly?
        randomNumbers - Set the numbers randomly?
        randomPorts - Set the ports Randomly?
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Precondition violated

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(int gameID,
                     CatanColor color)
              throws NonMoveException
        Adds a player to the given game
        Parameters:
        gameID - Game to be added to
        color - Color to represent player
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Pre condition violation

      • setupJoinGame

        public void setupJoinGame()
                   throws NonMoveException
        Gets a list from the server of all the games available to join
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - User not logged in

      • signIn

        public void signIn(java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password)
            throws NonMoveException
        Uses the given username and password to try and enter the server.
        Parameters:
        username - Username
        password - Password
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Pre condition violated

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws NonMoveException
        Creates a new user name on the server, if the username is not already taken. Logs them simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        username - Username
        password - Password
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Precondition violation

      • canPlaceCity

        public boolean canPlaceCity(VertexLocation vertLoc)
                     throws NonMoveException
        Asks the inspector if a city may be placed in the given vertex
        Parameters:
        vertLoc -
        Returns:
        True if user may place city there, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Pre conditions violated

      • canPlaceRoad

        public boolean canPlaceRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
                     throws NonMoveException
        Checks to see if a user may place a road at a given edge by calling the inspector.
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - location of edge to place road
        Returns:
        Whether or not a user may place a road
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Pre condition violated

      • canPlaceRobber

        public boolean canPlaceRobber(HexLocation hexLoc)
                       throws NonMoveException
        Asks the inspector if the robber may be placed on the given hex
        Parameters:
        hexLoc - Location of hex to place robber
        Returns:
        Whether or not a robber can move there
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Pre-condition violation

      • canPlaceSettlement

        public boolean canPlaceSettlement(VertexLocation vertLoc)
                           throws NonMoveException
        Asks the inspector if a user may place a settlement there.
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - Location to put the user
        Returns:
        Whether or not a user may build a settlement there
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - Pre-Conditions violated

      • initFromModel

        public void initFromModel()
        Imports the model into the controller/view

      • placeCity

        public void placeCity(VertexLocation vertLoc)
               throws PlayingException
        Tells the model where the user wants to place the city. Then it tells the server and compares the returned model to its own.
        Parameters:
        vertLoc - Location to build city
        Throws:
        PlayingException - invalid pre condition

      • placeRoad

        public void placeRoad(boolean setupMode,
                      EdgeLocation roadLocation)
               throws PlayingException
        Places the road on the map in the model and then on the server. It then compares the model returned by the server with its own.
        Parameters:
        setupMode - Is this happening in setup mode?
        roadLocation - Location of Road
        Throws:
        PlayingException - Invalid preconditions

      • placeRobber

        public void placeRobber(HexLocation location,
                        int victimIndex)
                 throws PlayingException
        Moves the robber to the location on the map in the model and then the server. The model returned by the server is then compared to its own.
        Parameters:
        location - New location of robber
        victimIndex - PlayerID of robbed person
        Throws:
        PlayingException - Pre-conditions violated

      • placeSettlement

        public void placeSettlement(boolean setupMode,
                            VertexLocation vertLoc)
                     throws PlayingException
        Tells the model then the server where a user is placing a settlement. The two models afterwards are compared.
        Parameters:
        setupMode - Is this setup?
        vertLoc - Location of settlement
        Throws:
        PlayingException - Pre condition violation

      • canMakeTrade

        public boolean canMakeTrade(ResourceType resource,
                            int amount)
                     throws PlayingException
        Checks the model to see if a user can trade that much of one resource
        Parameters:
        resource - Resource to trade
        amount - Amount of resource
        Returns:
        Whether or not the user can trade
        Throws:
        TradeException - Pre condtion violation
        PlayingException

      • makeTrade

        public void makeTrade(int ratio,
                      ResourceType inputResource,
                      ResourceType outputResource)
               throws PlayingException
        Tells the model then the server about the trade. Compares the two resulting models.
        Parameters:
        ratio - 2,3 or 4
        inputResource - What user gives
        outputResource - What user gets
        Throws:
        PlayingException - Pre-condition violation

      • addAI

        public void addAI(java.lang.String aiType)
           throws NonMoveException
        adds an AI to the given game on the server
        Parameters:
        aiType - LARGEST_ARMY
        Throws:
        NonMoveException - precondtion violation

      • rollDice

        public void rollDice()
              throws PlayingException
        Simulates two die, sends the result to the model and server and compares the result models.
        Throws:
        PlayingException - pre condition violation

      • endTurn

        public void endTurn()
             throws PlayingException
        tells the model that the current state for the player is over and then the server. The resulting model is then compared.
        Throws:
        PlayingException - Pre-condition violation
